concept.title: File Compression Types
concept.shortdesc: The Directory origin can read uncompressed files, files compressed by ZIP and gzip, or a combination of all.

conbody.p: Directory originfile compression typescompression typesfor DirectoryConfigure Directory to indicate the type of files to read and define the file name pattern appropriately. For example, when reading compression files, make sure to specify the appropriate file extension or use a wildcard for the extension.When reading a combination of types, use an asterisk to represent the file extension to avoid excluding an extension type.
